mapper.sql: l_id, s_id, begin_id, end_id, begin_time, end_time, pay_status
mapper.insert: insert into t_shipinfo (l_id, s_id, begin_id, end_id, begin_time, end_time, pay_status) values (#{lId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beginId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_shipinfo
l_id,
s_id,
begin_id,
end_id,
begin_time,
end_time,
pay_status,
#{lId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{beginId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{endId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update t_shipinfo
s_id = #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
begin_id = #{beginId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
end_id = #{endId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where l_id = #{lId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_shipinfo set s_id = #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, begin_id = #{beginId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_id = #{endId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, begin_time = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where l_id = #{lId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select si.lid,b.bname,e.ename,s.*,si.begintime,si.endtime,si.paystatus from t_shipinfo si INNER JOIN t_ship s on si.sid= s.sid INNER JOIN t_begin b on si.beginid=b.beginid INNER JOIN t_end e on si.endid=e.endid
